entry.title: 3236443 - SAP Readiness Check for SAP Cloud ALMについて
entry.content:
SAP Readiness Check for SAP Cloud ALMの実施を予定しています。

前提条件に記載のあるSTコンポーネント3477026 は事前にすべて当てきる必要はありますでしょうか？

Readiness Checkに関係あるのか無いのかを読み取ることができませんでしたので確認をお願いいたします。


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: Custom Code Migration (BTP): Object Navigation missing
entry.content:
Hello,

We are using the Custom Code Migration App in the BTP. In the list of findings the objects are named but they are all disabled for navigation (greyed out) and therefore it's not possible to find the specific code segment in these objects that need to be adjusted. This is case for every finding.

 

Any information on why the navigation is disabled or how to alternatively find the affected code segments would be greatly appreciated.

Best Regards

entry.title: Readiness Check: Target S/4HANA Version: SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud 2023
entry.content:
Hello,

Astrid Tschense shared a slide with the latest target S/4HANA versions during her presentation at DSAG Thementag S/4HANA. In her screenshot I can see a Target S/4HANA Version " SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud 2023 [03 (02/2025) FPS].

We implemented the lastest notes for the readiness check, but we are still not able to see the target version. Also I cannot find anything in help portal. 

Is the target version alreay available for customers?

 

Kind regards

Valeska

entry.title: SUSG integration with ATC
entry.content:
Hello All - there are soo many tcodes/ tool within SAP for performing analysis of Sap ECC custom code to S4 Hana conversion , which one is most preferred one ?

custom code  -  Analyze the custom code to S4 using ATC - ? or other SAP Readiness check2.0  /SDF/? 

usage of custom code - SUSG , SCMON , UPL - ? other ?

are there any sap ecc related fiori app to merge information of custom code along with usage ? - like CCMC / CCLM in solution manager ?

 

thanks

entry.title: S4 - Migration - Fiori App
entry.content:
Hello All - 

for planning the migration of custom code from ECC to S4 , ( Fiori Migration app need to be always run on S4 as backend system? 

or if we have run the readiness check in the ECC using ATC (ABAP TEST COCKPIT) , can the zip file be uploaded directly ? 

 

thanks 

aakash

entry.title: Checklist Before HANA Upgrade (Brownfield)
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts,

I have a customer who will be transitioning from SAP ECC to SAP HANA. A brownfield migration is planned. In this context, what is the easiest way to identify the developments and enhancements made in the ECC system? What should I do to adjust these developments after the system is upgraded to HANA?

I've gathered some information through research, but I'm looking for comprehensive knowledge. I'm open to your valuable suggestions.

 

Kind regards,
Nedim YILMAZ

entry.title: SAP Note #2502552に記載のノートについて
entry.content:
SAPご担当者様

お世話になります。
現在、S/4HANAアップグレード検討の準備として、SAP Readiness Checkを実行したいと考えています。
Readiness Checkで実行するシンプル化項目整合性チェック有効化の調査をしているのですが、以下ノートについて追加で確認させてください。

DIGITS - S4TC - SAP S/4HANA 変換およびアップグレード新規シンプル化項目チェック


＜ご質問＞

SAP Note #DIGITSについて

Q1. SAP Note #DIGITSの"ソリューション"項目の中に、「TCI に対する追加修正 (自動的に取り込まれる)」と書かれているノートが8件あります。これらのノートが"自動的に取り込まれる"とはどういう意味でしょうか？

また、Q1で前述した8件のノートは、SAP Note #DIGITSの前提条件であると認識しています。その中のひとつSAP Note #DIGITSの前提条件にSAP Note #DIGITSがあります。
このSAP Note #DIGITSについて以下2点確認させてください。

SAP Note #DIGITSについて

Q2."現象"や"理由および前提条件"項目に、"SAP S/4HANA DIGITS リリース"の記載があるのですが、こちらのノートはSAP S/4HANA DIGITS リリースへのアップグレード時のみ対象でしょうか？それ以降のリリースへのアップグレード時も対象ですか？

 

Q3.このノートの注意点の一つに「当 SAP ノートは、SAP S/4HANA 出力制御を使用していないアプリケーションには関連しません。」とあります。今回のアップグレード対象システムでは使用していないソリューションなのではないかと思っているのですが、SAP S/4HANA 出力制御を使用していない場合、このノートは適用不可・不要でしょうか？また、SAP S/4HANA 出力制御の使用有無についての確認方法はありますか？

＜追加情報＞
現行S/4HANA本番機の関連ソフトウェアコンポーネントのリリース：
SAP_BASIS    751 SP02
S4CORE        101 SP01


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: S4/HANA Readiness Check Issue
entry.content:
We ran the readiness check program in our ECC dev system with target S/4 version "SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition 2023 (03 (02/2025) FPS)". We uploaded the zip file in the SAP marketplace readiness check and when the data is loaded and we want to go inside the analysis we are getting the below warning. Not sure which SAP note it is referring here- Does it mean to update "SAP Note assistance" SNOTE?

We have detected that your SAP Note does not support Private Cloud Edition, and as a result, we cannot fully guarantee the accuracy of the current check results. In light of your particular scenario (conversion / upgrade), we strongly recommend that you upgrade to the latest SAP Notes version and perform the check again.

entry.title: Impact on implementing the note 3112362
entry.content:
Hi Team,We are currently in the preparation phase of our SAP S/4 HANA and are planning to implement the SAP  3112362  note - SAP Readiness Check for SAP ERP Usage and Data Profiling in our ECC system. 

Before proceeding, we would like to understand the potential impact of implementing the note on our system.

Please help us with the below details.

  1. Potential impact of implementing this note on our production system, especially in terms of performance or stability during data collection.
  2. Whether this note should be implemented during non working hours to avoid impact
  3. Required pre requisites and dependencies 
  4. Any known issues or recommendations from past implementations of this note
  5. Any post implementation activities needs to be performed to complete the set up.

    Your support in clarifying these points will help us plan the implementation effectively.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: SAP アップグレードについて
entry.content:
S/4HANA 2021から2023にバージョンアップグレード実施する予定ですが、
アセスメントとして現行のカスタマイズ、アドオン機能にどのぐらい影響あるか分析するため、
SAPに標準分析ツールなどがございますでしょうか。
もしあれば、ご教示いただけますと幸いです。

検索するとSAP readiness check というツールがありまして、
こちらはアップグレード前の分析用のツールでしょうか。


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: レジネスチェック実行時インストールされてないコンポーネントが表示される
entry.content:
インストールされていないコンポーネントの情報がレジネスチェックに表示されるのは正しいか教えてください、違っている場合はその対処法を教えてください。
SAPの提供している情報に詳しいものはありませんでしたので、これはSAPの不具合と考え質問をしています。
Please let me know if it is correct that information about components that are not installed is displayed in the readiness check, and if not, please tell me how to deal with it.
There was no detailed information provided by SAP, so I think this is a bug in SAP and am asking the question.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Can Joule AI Make SAP Readiness Check & Process Insights Smarter?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m Tommy, an intern at SAP. As part of my internship, I’ve been given the research topic:

                  "How to utilise Joule to interpret SAP tools such as Readiness Check and Signavio Process Insights"

After discussions with the original topic proposer, I’ve refined this to:

                    "Leveraging Joule AI for immediate, context-aware interpretation of SAP tools such as Readiness Check and Process                                  Insights outputs through integrated or standalone models."

Current ideas under exploration:

Potential role of AI (Joule):

                     Integrated approach – Joule embedded directly in tools for live Q&A and guidance.

                     Standalone approach – Central Joule portal where exported tool data is uploaded for AI-generated summaries.

Industry & process-specific insights:

                     Could Joule be trained using Signavio Process Explorer as a knowledge source?

Customer-specific process learning:

                     Could Joule learn a customer’s business processes over time to adjust tool benchmark thresholds?

                     For example, if a process is flagged as problematic by a benchmark but is actually fine for a specific customer, could                                 Joule adapt to avoid false alarms?

I’m not looking to start a conversation and see if this direction aligns with others’ perspectives and see if anyone has experience in the topic.

Would love to hear your thoughts!

entry.title: シンプル化項目チェック相関確認の件
entry.content:
弊社では、現在使用しているS/4 HANA 2021をS/4 HANA 2023バージョンにアップグレードする予定です。
一部の機能に変更が生じる可能性を考慮し、アップグレード前の注意事項を確認するためにSIチェックを実行いたしました。
Note2399707で提供されている手順に従い、プログラム/SDF/RC_START_CHECKを実行し、チェック結果を出力しました。
結果の一部は添付ファイルのスクリーンショットに示されています。
出力されたデータレコードが多数あり、各結果には対応するノートがありますが、今回のS/4 HANAアップグレードに関連する内容のうち、
どれを重点的に注目すべきかがよく分かりません。
添付ファイルに示されているように、関連性について3つのステータスがあります。
今回のS/4 HANAアップグレードとどのような関連があるか教えていただけますでしょうか。


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: SAP Readiness Check
entry.content:
As part of our strategic development, we are currently evaluating the introduction of the SAP Integration Suite. In order to establish a solid basis for decision-making, we would like to conduct a readiness check—ideally within the scope of our existing SAP Enterprise Support contract, if possible. The goal is to analyze the current system landscape and integration scenarios in order to better assess the effort, prerequisites, and potential challenges associated with a future implementation.

I would appreciate your feedback on whether such a readiness check is covered under Enterprise Support, and to what extent. Additionally, I would like to understand what the next steps would be for scheduling such an assessment.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Analysis file generated out of RC_COLLECT_ANALYSIS_DATA are not able to see in Browser
entry.content:

As we are preparing to upgrade our S/4 HANA version to 2025, I have installed all applicable SAP Notes and successfully executed the program RC_COLLECT_ANALYSIS_DATA to generate data for Analysis as part of SAP Readiness Check.

When I open any of the .xml files in Microsoft Edge or Chrome, I am seeing empty screen.

Thanks!

entry.title: Program MMIM_S4SIC_CHECKS Result error QTY_AGGR_CHECK
entry.content:
Hi,

We ran the program MMIM_S4SIC_CHECKS in a ECC6 system. In the log, we have the error check ID QTY_AGGR_CHECK

Inconsistency between MCHB and MARD: unrestricted stock quantity MANDT: 400, MATNR: AL0821, WERKS: 1001, LGORT: 0069,

The SAP Note 2197392 tells that in case errors occur, we can analyze errors further with transaction MB5K and archive documents. But we do not want to archive our documents.

What is the way to correct this?

entry.title: Simplification List - Asset ACcounting
entry.content:
Dear SAP Friends,

I am opening this ticket in order to send this issue to Fixed Asset Expert team.

Kindly check and let me know.  This issue we are getting during Simplifcation List S/4 HANA 2025 upgrade in sandbox.

Check Sub-ID:"FI_AA_CUST_AFASL", return code = 8 .Number of calculation periods differing from deprec. key. CC XX Asset 00000000XXXX-0001 -

I see some period controls are not read when we use "depreciation to date" in AFAMA.  

I have found the note for this. 2618023 - Migration preparatory checks for FI-AA: Error messages and possible solutions 

Please let me know if you had faced this error in the past.
